resources.string: An error occured while transfering data. Exit.
Bluetooth is disabled. Please enable it.
An error occured while connecting to bluetooth device. Try again.
Remote controller is not on list
Bluetooth device need to be paired.
To show remote controller on list, you must pair it with your phone once. Click OK to enter Bluetooth Setting and pair your device with remote controll.
Bluetooth is unsupported on your device. Exit.

Q. Bluetooth connection keeps failing.
 A. There are many cases about failing bluetooth connection, many of them are these
 1. Already connected to another device
 If the bluetooth device is connected with another device like phone, tablet, your connection might be failed. Try after disconnecting with them.
 2. Battery is lack
 If your remote controll battery is almost used, the bluetooth chipset might get lack power supply. Try after changing to new battery.
 3. Other electronic devices are distracting bluetooth connection
 Other electronic devices(Wireless Headphones, Smart Watch, ETC.) might distract bluetooth connection. Try again after remove or move them.

Developer : Republic of Korea, Sungbo High School 3rd Grade Yongmin-Yoo
